author: rwesten
msg: creating a Branch for the Entityhub 0.10.* as 0.11.0 will introduce not backward compatible changes. This branch is intended to be used for merging future bug fixes back to the 0.10.* version of the Entityhub

author: markrmiller
msg: merge back r1358214 SOLR-3575: solr.xml should default to persist=true

author: markrmiller
msg: CHANGES entry for SOLR-3563: Unloading all cores in a SolrCloud collection will now cause the removal of that collection's meta data from ZooKeeper.

author: markrmiller
msg: CHANGES entry for SOLR-3562: Add options to remove instance dir or data dir on core unload.
